title: South Bend, Indiana
summary: South Bend is a city in and the county seat of St. Joseph County, Indiana,[4] on the St. Joseph River near its southernmost bend, from which it derives its name. As of the 2010 census, the city had a total of 101,168 residents; its metropolitan statistical area had a population of 318,586, while its combined statistical area had 721,296.[5] It is the  fourth-largest city in Indiana.
